message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $9,500.  I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  I could meet you halfway at $9,250. I believe that's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $9,000 for the product.
